name: FRigUnit_GetControlRotator
doc: GetControlRotator is used to retrieve a single Rotator from a hierarchy.

Control: The name of the Control to retrieve the Rotator for.
Space:
Defines if the Control's Rotator should be retrieved
in local or global space.
Rotator: The current value of the control.
Minimum: The minimum value of the control.
Maximum: The maximum value of the control.
